content.title: IVRI Institute Scholarship For M.V.Sc. And Ph.D.
content.department: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
content.details: The Indian Veterinary Research Institute will award scholarships to MVSc and PhD students. IVRI Scholarship is admissible to only those candidates who are admitted through competitive entrance examination for MVSc/PhD degree programmes.
benefits: Rs. 7,560/- per month for Master’s Degree programme for 2 years with a contingent grant of Rs. 6,000/- per annum for two years
Rs. 13,125/- per month for Doctoral programme for three years with a contingent grant of Rs. 10,000/- per annum for three years
eligibility: Candidates must have a Bachelor’s Degree in Veterinary Science with a minimum of 60% marks (55% for SC/ST or sponsored candidates) for Master’s programme.
Candidates must have an MVSc degree with a minimum CGPA of 6.50/10.00 scale for Doctoral programme.
Minimum age limit for PhD candidates is 23 years.
content.application_process: Online application process based on competitive entrance examination conducted by the Education Division, Indian Council of Agricultural Research, New Delhi.

faqs.question: How to get admission in Master's and Doctoral Programme?
faqs.answer: Admission in Master degree is through All India Entrance Examination for Admission (AIEEA).

faqs.question: What documents do I need to upload along with the Application Form?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to upload scanned images of photograph, signature, and thumb impression.
